UPPSC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 7466 Assistant Teacher Post
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Jul 29, 2025, 15:34 IST
 Uttar Pradesh Public Service Commission
 7,466 Jobs |  Posted On : 29-Jul-2025 |  Uttar Pradesh |  Salary : 12,000 to 25,000




FOLLOW

The Uttar Pradesh Public Service Commission (UPPSC) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 7466 Assistant Teacher Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech, B.Ed, MCA, or Any Degree can grab this chance and apply for the UPPSC Recruitment 2025. Hee we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the website on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government obs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Uttar Pradesh

UPPSC Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Assistant Teacher	7466	B.E/ B.Tech, B.Ed, MCA, Any Degree

Age Limit for the UPPSC Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit:21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 40 years.

Age Relaxation

SC/ ST/ OBC of UP Candidates: 5 Years
PH of UP Candidates: 15 Years

Selection Process for the UPPSC Recruitment 2025

Written Test
Interview

Salary Structure for the UPPSC Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 12,000 /- per month.
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 25,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the UPPSC Recruitment 2025

UR/ OBC/ EWS Candidates: Rs. 125/-
SC/ ST/ Ex-Servicemen Candidates: Rs. 65/-
PWD Candidates: Rs. 25/-
How to Apply for the UPPSC Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the Recruitment or Career Page.
Check for the Assistant Teacher Notification 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Click on the Apply Online link.
Register with your mobile number and password.
Fill out the given details carefully.
Upload the required documents to the application form.
Pay the application fee (if applicable)
Submit the application form and take a printout of the application form for further refernce.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	28-07-2025
Last Date of Application	28-08-2025
Apply Online	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
